rules.why_relevant_summary: Defines single source of truth so the AI agent knows which backend to read/write for each data type instead of misusing the wiki or duplicates.
All authenticated access, including via AI agent, is tied to an employee identity and system roles; prevents privilege escalation.
rules.compact_rule:
IDENTITY_AND_ROLES:
  Each authenticated_user MUST HAVE:
    user.employee_id,
    employee.location,
    employee.department,
    one_or_more system_roles (e.g. "SalesUser", "HRAdmin", "ITAdmin");
  EFFECTIVE_ACCESS = f(system_roles, job_needs);
  AI_AGENT MUST execute API calls ONLY under the current_user's identity/roles and MUST NOT self‑assign or elevate roles.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Public/anonymous users (if exposed via a public chatbot) must not reach internal transactional systems or confidential data.
Defines which employee fields are broadly visible internally via the chatbot so the AI agent can safely answer people-related queries.
Protects confidential HR data such as salaries and notes; explicitly mentioned as something chatbot must not reveal.
Skills & wills are widely used but should not be dumped indiscriminately; exposure depends on context.
Prevents the wiki (and thus AI outputs or writes) from becoming a container for highly sensitive personal data.
Controls who can change time entries and under which statuses, which is critical for any AI-driven automation of timesheets.
Ensures the AI agent obeys backend security decisions instead of trying alternative paths to obtain restricted data.
Clarifies that all mutating operations the AI performs (e.g., updating employees, projects, or time) must go through backend permission checks.
Maintains correct auditing when the AI agent writes into core systems like the employee registry.
rules.compact_rule:
AUDIT_TRAIL.CHANGED_BY:
  WHEN AI_AGENT updates records in EmployeeRegistry, CRM, ProjectRegistry or TimeTracking:
    MUST set changed_by = current_user.employee_id (or a dedicated service identity explicitly mapped to a human sponsor);
    MUST NOT spoof changed_by to another_employee OR leave it unset.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents the AI agent from treating wiki descriptions as live transactional data, which could cause inconsistencies and leakage.
